profile.name: [ InchI ]
profile.summary: Delivering reliable infrastructure by combining automation, cloud experience and pragmatic operations improvement.

skills.title: DevOps Automation
skills.description: Experience with Docker, Kubernetes and GitLab CI/CD. Skilled at wiring Jenkins, Ansible and ArgoCD to build automated pipelines from commit to production deployment.

skills.title: Enterprise Networking
skills.description: Plan and maintain WAF, firewalls, switches, Wi-Fi, web servers and VPN. Implement load balancing, HA and rsync replication to keep services consistent across sites.

skills.title: Security & Firewalls
skills.description: Hands-on with Palo Alto, SonicWALL and Fortigate platforms. Build layered protection, policy governance and incident monitoring to reduce risk.

skills.title: Switching Infrastructure
skills.description: Deploy and manage Cisco and HPE Aruba switches. Design VLAN, ACL and high-availability topologies for data centers and branch offices.

skills.title: Operating Systems
skills.description: Administer Windows Server and Linux distributions (CentOS, Ubuntu, Oracle Linux). Build automated provisioning, patching and compliance workflows.

skills.title: Virtualization & Cloud
skills.description: Operate VMware vSphere, Hyper-V, Citrix Xen, Proxmox and Nutanix. Optimize hybrid environments spanning private clouds and Azure / GCP public clouds.

skills.title: Database Reliability
skills.description: Maintain MSSQL and MySQL Cluster. Build redundancy, backup and monitoring policies to keep data consistent and performant.

skills.title: System Integration
skills.description: Roll out Active Directory, WSUS and Windows Server application services. Centralize identity governance and patch management.

skills.title: Storage & Backup
skills.description: Support NetApp, Synology and QNAP environments. Design snapshot, off-site backup and storage capacity strategies for critical workloads.

skills.title: Observability Platforms
skills.description: Deploy MRTG, Prometheus, Grafana, LibreNMS and ELK stacks. Build dashboards, alerting and trend analysis for better service visibility.

skills.title: Scripting & Automation
skills.description: Create automation with Python, Windows Script Host and Linux shell scripts. Reduce repetitive tasks and deliver reliable operations playbooks.
